text: Leirpollen or Store Leirpollen (North Sami: Juovlavuotna) is a branch (Norwegian: fjordarm) of the Tana Fjord in Tana (municipality); Leirpollen is 5.5 kilometer long.Leirpollen p√• Norgeskart.no fra Statens kartverk == Related pages== *Fjord == Sources== category:Fjords Category:Bodies of water of Norway
title: Leirpollen
